creator: harris.andrew@optusnet.com.au
text:
I have setup a Virtual host www.eprogram.com.au with an Application base 
of 'webroot/eprogram.com.au'. I then created a ROOT context with a Document 
Base of 'www.eprogram.com.au' and a Path of blank ('').

This works fine and when I restart Tomcat everything works fine when I hit 
www.eprogram.com.au, however what I find is that I also have a new context 
of 'www.eprogram.com.au' with a Document Base of 'C:/Program Files/Apache 
Software Foundation/Tomcat 5.0/webroot/eprogram.com.au/www.eprogram.com.au' and 
a path of '/www.eprogram.com.au'.

Have I done something wrong?

Andrew

Yes. The host will also auto deploy your context, since it's in the appBase. How
about not filing a bug ?
creator: remm@apache.org
